com.bfg.backend.repository

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,java.lang.Long>
    UserRepository is used for interfacing with the database. It extends CrudRepository for full CRUD operations. This is autowired by Spring in the SocketHandler class.
    Author:
    jln, emball

    • Method Summary

      Finds a user by their username and password.

      java.lang.String findByUsername(java.lang.String user_name)

        user_pass - The password entered
